PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:			Southern Home Counties, Bournemouth
CAREER SUMMARY
Feb 2018 to date Wireless Well Solutions, Expro North Sea Ltd
Position: Business Development Analyst

Own departmental adherence to QMS

PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:			Southern Home Counties, Bournemouth
CAREER SUMMARY
Feb 2018 to date Wireless Well Solutions, Expro North Sea Ltd
Position: Business Development Analyst
Business Development Analyst, essential for providing KPI metrics and analysis for a global provider of data and analytical solutions in the Oil & Gas industry. A key member of the Bid Management team, responsible for the collation of all Bids and Tenders across the organisation.
Own the delivery of Technical and Commercial proposals through management of stakeholders
Control and manage Project Workflows using Jira/ Asana/ Confluence
Own departmental adherence to QMS
Manage and maintain Bid/Tenders progress through milestones adhering to strict deadlines
Produce accurate and engaging bids through creative and concise writing skills
Maintain an acute eye to key details
Demonstrate a solid understanding of customer objectives and key deliverables
Manage and Conduct Audit in line with ISO accreditation
KPI Management Reporting
Manage and maintain CRM (salesforce)
Market Intelligence reporting
Support Front Line Sales prospecting
Apr 2017 to Feb 2018 Two Brydges Club
Position: Assistant Manager
Assistant Manager at a revered Private Members Club in central London
Key Responsibilities:
Front of House Management
Premium Hospitality
Personnel Management
Rota planning and preparation
Event Management
Mar 2015 to Apr 2017 Key Industrial Equipment
Position: Content Manager, Marketing
Responsible for group mailing promotional literature and incentivised targeted marketing campaigns.
Key Responsibilities:
Produce engaging content for web and hard copy
Create specification literature on products
Produce content for promotional blogs
Launching new product ranges online
Meeting campaign deadlines
Oct 2014 to Mar 2015 LHE Professions, Close Brewery Rentals
Position: Business Support Co-ordinator
Administrative and Sales support for Global finance provider
Key Responsibilities:
Assisting in the production and distribution of marketing material
Liaising with suppliers
Monitoring orders
Producing documentation
Answering queries concerning the end of lease process
Apr 2013 to Sept 2014 PruHealth
Position: Private Healthcare Associate
Providing specialised administrative support within the Private Healthcare Insurance Sector
Key Responsibilities:
Complete referrals for Private Medical Underwriting
Process acceptance terms and application guidelines
Vetting agency application forms
Setting up new agencies
Maintaining the agency details
Completing agency adjustments
Paying commission
Adjustments to commission rates
Agency closures
Deeds of Novation
Aug 2008 to Jul 2012 RIAS Insurance PLC
Position: Accounts Advisor
Administrative support to the Finance and Accounts Department within Insurance Industry
Key Responsibilities:
Managing client’s direct debit credit agreements
Overseeing aged debt reports.
Managing the credit control files
Producing the bank reconciliation
Offering excellent Customer Service
Represent the department at company's staff forum
Jul 2007 to Aug 2008
Position: Motor Inbound Sales Advisor
Front line sales personnel within the Motor Insurance Industry
Key Responsibilities:
Meeting sales driven targets
Working as part of a team
Adhering to FCA guidelines and call scripts
COMMENT
5+ years in Bid Collation and Tender Management
5+ years in Business Development Growth Analysis
15+ years’ Experience in MS Systems – Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint, Teams
CRM – Salesforce Super User
Full UK Driving Licence
LRQA Certified Internal Auditor
St Johns Ambulance – Mental Health First Aider
Educated to A-Level
For further information please contact Julie Smith on 01695 570 696 or email julie.smith@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
